subject: Basketball
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: The ex-wife of the former N.B.A.  player Lorenzen Wright was threatened at her home by three men who were carrying guns and looking for him about six weeks before he was shot to death, the woman’s lawyer said.
snippet: The ex-wife of the former N.B.A.  player Lorenzen Wright was threatened at her home by three men who were carrying guns and looking for him about six weeks before he was shot to death, the woman’s lawyer said.
